hotels.title: Akita City Centre Hotel with Top-Floor Restaurant
hotels.description: Only steps from JR Akita Station, ANA Crowne Plaza Akita, an IHG Hotel, is a soothing refuge ideally situated to launch you into life at the heart of this bustling city. Indulge in retail therapy at nearby Seibu Department Store, dive into fascinating museums and festivals or explore Senshu Park for an escape to nature. As the sun sets, head up to the SORA Sky Grill Buffet Restaurant on the top floor and take in the panoramic vistas of Akita's skyline.
